key.name: icon-display
key.description: Set to true to display system monitor icon in status bar.(NOTICE: The icon will be shown when none of the others is shown.)

key.name: memory-display
key.description: Set to false to remove memory display in status bar

key.name: memory-show-text
key.description: Set to true to show 'mem' before memory display

key.name: swap-display
key.description: Set to false to remove swap display in status bar

key.name: swap-show-text
key.description: Set to true to show 'swap' before swap display

key.name: cpu-display
key.description: Set to false to remove cpu display in status bar

key.name: cpu-show-text
key.description: Set to true to show 'cpu' before cpu display

key.name: net-display
key.description: Set to false to remove net display in status bar

key.name: net-show-text
key.description: Set to true to show 'net' before net display

key.name: center-display
key.summary: Display informations next to the clock
key.description: True: Set information at the center, False: Set information in status bar (at top right)
